FuncDef: This command displays the ARP table for the IES instance.

ParaDef.Info: Displays only ARP entries in the ARP table with the specified IP address. ParamDefault: Default- All IP addresses

Displays only ARP entries in the ARP table with the specified 48-bit MAC address. The MAC address can be expressed in the form aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff or aa-bb-cc-dd-ee-ff where aa, bb, cc, dd, ee and ff are hexadecimal numbers. ParamDefault: Default- All MAC addresses.
Displays SAP information for the specified SAP ID.
Displays the IP interface name for which to display matching ARPs.
